response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product that has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us due to its unique features, durability, and the expertise required to produce it. We believe it could be a valuable asset to you, offering unparalleled benefits and solutions tailored to your needs. Considering its exceptional value and the opportunity it presents, we're offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. We're confident that you'll find immense value in this investment. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 14500}
